document.full_text: italy marked 150 years as a unified state on thursday, inviting world leaders to festivities that contrasted starkly with a febrile political mood after crushing local election losses for prime minister silvio berlusconi.
document.title: italy marks unification in heated political climate
lines_and_colors: italy marked 150 years as a unified state on thursday, inviting world leaders to festivities that contrasted starkly with a febrile political mood after crushing local election losses for prime minister silvio berlusconi.
